structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Powers of department as to designated city streets -- Agreements.
law.text: On and after July 1, 1942, the Department of Highways may maintain and repair, construct and reconstruct under its control and supervision such city streets so designated by the commissioner of highways, and may make appropriations and expenditures out of its fund for such purposes. The department may enter into any and all contracts inclusive of agreements with cities and with any federal agencies authorized so to do for such purpose.
law.history: Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 1. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 30, sec. 3.
